Set()ã€map()æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ weakMap/weakSet/weakRef â€‹

js
map()æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆåŠå†™æ³•ï¼Ÿ
map å±äº es6 æ–°å¢åŠ çš„æ•°æ®ç»“æ„,map()æ˜¯é”®å€¼å¯¹ï¼Œé‡Œé¢çš„é”®å’Œå€¼å¯ä»¥ä»»æ„ï¼ŒMap å¯¹è±¡æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ª size å±æ€§ï¼Œå­˜å‚¨äº†é”®å€¼å¯¹çš„ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œè€Œ object å¯¹è±¡æ²¡æœ‰ç±»ä¼¼å±æ€§ã€‚

let newMap = new Map([['name','zhangsan'],['age',10]]);
console.log(newMap ); //{'name'=>'zhangsan','age'=>10}

let newMap = new Map([
  ["name", "zhangsan"],
  ["age", 10],
]);
newMap.set("sex", "man");
console.log(newMap); //{'name' => 'zhangsan', 'age' => 10, 'sex' => 'man'}
newMap.set("name", "lisi");
console.log(newMap); // {'name' => 'lisi', 'age' => 10, 'sex' => 'man'}
newMap.set("sex", "man").set("aaa", "hahah");
console.log(newMap); // {'name' => 'lisi', 'age' => 10, 'sex' => 'man', 'aaa' => 'hahah'}

class(é¢å‘å¯¹è±¡ç¼–ç¨‹) â€‹

js

class Person {
  constyuctor(name, age) {
    this.name = name
    this.age = age
  }

  init() {
    return this.name + this.age
  }
}
